member.name: M:PropertyService.Controllers.PropertyController.GetProperties
member.remarks: This API method returns a list of all available properties.

member.name: M:PropertyService.Controllers.PropertyController.GetProperty(System.Int32)
member.remarks: This API method returns details of a property based on its ID.

member.name: M:PropertyService.Controllers.PropertyController.CreateProperty(PropertyService.Models.Property)
member.remarks: This API method allows creating a new property.
member.param: The information of the new property to be created.

member.name: M:PropertyService.Controllers.PropertyController.UpdateProperty(System.Int32,PropertyService.Models.Property)
member.remarks: This API method allows updating information of an existing property based on its ID.
member.param: The ID of the property to be updated.
The new information of the property.

member.name: M:PropertyService.Controllers.PropertyController.DeleteProperty(System.Int32)
member.remarks: This API method allows deleting a property based on its ID.
member.param: The ID of the property to be deleted.

member.name: P:PropertyService.Models.Property.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID of the property.

member.name: P:PropertyService.Models.Property.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property.
member.example: Moradia a venda em Figueiró dos Vinhos

member.name: P:PropertyService.Models.Property.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the property (e.g., residential, commercial).

member.name: P:PropertyService.Models.Property.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the property.

member.name: P:PropertyService.Models.Property.Price
member.summary: Gets or sets the price of the property.

member.name: P:PropertyService.Models.Property.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the property.
member.example: Venha conhecer a moradia dos seus sonhos!
